duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop leading-edge Salesforce business solutions and user stories to meet clients' business needs.
Partner with team to identify business needs, gather user requirements, and develop deployable features.
Understand technology trends and deliver user-friendly client experiences.
Plan and lead business requirements gathering sessions and lead your team to fulfill business needs.
Translate business needs into effective and detailed user stories, requirements, and acceptance criteria.
Deliver high business value products for clients and veterans.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or 4+ years of experience as a Business Analyst in lieu of a degree
